text: Days of Thunder is a 1990 American auto racing movie that was produced by Don Simpson and Jerry Bruckheimer and was directed by Tony Scott. Days of Thunder was released on June 27, 1990 in North America. The movie received mixed reviews with a 40% rating on Rotten Tomatoes and a 60 out of 100 from Metacritic. The movie had two video games based on it. == Cast == *Tom Cruise as Cole Trickle *Nicole Kidman as Dr. Claire Lewicki *Robert Duvall as Harry Hogge *Michael Rooker as Rowdy Burns *Cary Elwes as Russ Wheeler *Randy Quaid as Tim Daland *Fred Dalton Thompson as Big John *John C. Reilly as Buck Bretherton *J. C. Quinn as Waddell *Caroline Williams as Jeannie Burns *Leilani Sarelle as a Female Highway Patrol Officer who is actually a stripper hired by Harry as a prank on Cole. *Chris Ellis as Harlem Hoogerhyde *Don Simpson as Aldo Bennedetti (cameo) *Richard Petty as Himself (cameo) *Rusty Wallace as Himself (cameo) *Neil Bonnett as Himself (cameo) *Harry Gant as Himself (cameo) *Dr. Jerry Punch as Himself (cameo) == Other websites == *Days of Thunder at the Internet Movie Database Category:1990 romantic drama movies Category:1990s sports movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Auto racing movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Tony Scott Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: Days of Thunder
